title: Culture-Based Geometry Learning Design: Invention-Based Ethnomathematics GeoGebra (Ethnobra) Model Application

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary geometry concepts and basic comprehension of cultural education
context.additional_context: Most learners are office/administrative professionals aiming to simultaneously improve cultural literacy and geometric application skills. Smartphone usage is feasible, but PC environments are limited.

learning_goals: Learners analyze geometric patterns in traditional culture and apply them to at least three real-life problems.
Learners creatively design at least two culture-based geometric models using the Geogebra app.
Learners explain differences in learning styles during geometric problem-solving processes through peer evaluation and group activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
